entities.name: hufflepuffs
entities.description: The Hufflepuffs are one of the four houses in Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. They are mentioned as the group that Harry and Ron joined.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is a student at Hogwarts who is known to Harry and Ron. He is mistaken for Snape when he appears behind them in the corridor.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a teacher at Hogwarts who is known to be strict and intimidating. He is seen by Harry and Ron as they follow him through the corridors.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the main characters in the story and a student at Hogwarts. He is following Snape with his friend Ron.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend and a student at Hogwarts. He is following Snape with Harry.

relationships.description: Harry mistakes Percy for Snape when he appears behind them in the corridor.
Snape is heading towards the dungeons, which are located below the rest of the school.
Harry and Ron are following Snape together through the corridors.
Snape is heading towards the third floor, which Harry notices as they follow him.
